DataElement.preferredName: Target Non-Target New Lesion Indentification Classification Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A category that represents the kind of Target Non-target New Lesion Identification.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Target Non-Target New Lesion Identification Classification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention._The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention._The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized._A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

Concepts.definition: The identification of a lesion that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention.
The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention.
The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized.
